sourcesContent: import { AnimatePresence } from "framer-motion"; export default function IntroText() { return ( {showIntro ? ( Hey there, RRISD student! Congratulations, you're about to be a high schooler! Before you transition, it is vital to understand what your passion is and how you will move forward with our career. We're going to do something called a four year plan. ) : ( What is a four year plan? Here you can add more content about the four year plan or any other information you want to show after clicking 'NEXT'. )} ); }
